Name: Requiring the Mayor to submit reports concerning contracts for advertising space.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the Mayor to submit reports concerning contracts for advertising space.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Contracts
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Title 6 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 6-130 to read as follows:
6-130.  Report on the purchase of advertising space.  The mayor or his or her designee shall submit to the council on a quarterly basis a report detailing all contracts awarded by the city of New York for the purchase of advertising space in print, radio, television and internet media.  The report shall include the name of the vendor awarded each contract, the date the contract was awarded, the contract dollar amount and the manner of procurement for each contract.  
Â§2. This local law shall take effect sixty days after enactment.


LS #7321 
LC
05/13/09
